de.m0ep.socc.connectors

Interface Connector

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConnector, FacebookConnector, GooglePlusConnector, MoodleConnector, YoutubeConnector

    public interface Connector
    Interface for a connector to a social online community
    Author:
    Florian MÃ¼ller

      Reply a Post to the given parent Post.

      • getThreads

        java.util.Iterator<org.rdfs.sioc.Thread> getThreads(org.rdfs.sioc.Forum forum)
        Returns all Threads of the given Forum.
        Parameters:
        forum - Forum from where the Threads should be retrieved.
        Returns:
        Iterator of all found Threads.

      • getPosts

        java.util.Iterator<org.rdfs.sioc.Post> getPosts(org.rdfs.sioc.Container container)
        Returns all Posts an their Replies (also Posts) inside the given Container. The container can be a Forum or Thread where hasPosts(Container) returns true.
        Parameters:
        container - Container from where the Posts should be retrieved.
        Returns:
        Iterator of all found Posts.

      • getUsergroups

        java.util.Iterator<org.rdfs.sioc.Usergroup> getUsergroups()
        Returns all known Usergroups of this community.
        Returns:
        Iterator of all found Usergroups.

      • getUserAccounts

        java.util.Iterator<org.rdfs.sioc.UserAccount> getUserAccounts()
        Returns all known UserAccounts of this community.
        Returns:
        Iterator of all found UserAccounts.

      • canPublishOn

        boolean canPublishOn(org.rdfs.sioc.Container container)
        Tests if Posts can be published on this Container
        Parameters:
        container - Container to test for publishing.
        Returns:
        Returns true if it's ok to publish Posts on this Container, false otherwise.

      • canReplyOn

        boolean canReplyOn(org.rdfs.sioc.Post parent)
        Tests if it's possible to post a reply on this Post
        Parameters:
        parent - Post to test for replying.
        Returns:
        Returns true if it's ok to reply on this Post.

      • hasPosts

        boolean hasPosts(org.rdfs.sioc.Container container)
        Test if their are possible Posts inside this Container. E.g. a usual Forum has no Post direct inside it, but the threads inside this forum have some posts.
        Parameters:
        container - Container to test for containing Posts.
        Returns:
        Returns true if there are possibly Posts, false otherwise.

      • publishPost

        boolean publishPost(org.rdfs.sioc.Post post,
                  org.rdfs.sioc.Container container)
        Publish a Post to the given Container.
        Parameters:
        post - Post object to publish.
        container - Container where to publish the Post.
        Returns:
        Returns true if publishing was successful, false otherwise.

      • replyPost

        boolean replyPost(org.rdfs.sioc.Post post,
                org.rdfs.sioc.Post parent)
        Reply a Post to the given parent Post.
        Parameters:
        post - Post object of the reply.
        parent - Post where to reply on.
        Returns:
        Returns true if replying was successful, false otherwise.
